title: Drawing, "Drawings. Sketches.  Landscapes.  Jamica, West Indies", July 1865
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light bluish wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457c
signed: Signed with monogram, at lower right.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom right: Jamaica July //65
description: Horizontal view of the sun shining from behind clouds on to mountain ranges

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawings. Sketches.  Landscapes.  Jamica, West Indies", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite, brush and white gouache on light bluish wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-10-b.
